name: Miami Sim City Life Simulator 3D
description:
!! YOU CAN BE PART OF THE DEVELOPMENT !!

At the moment, the game is still in the early stages of development. This is good news, because it means you can help us make it the game you've always wanted!

To participate in the development, you can join our social channels where we publish news about updates, surveys and where you can also ask to add features and new content!

Our main channels are:

-Our official Facebook page, which can be visited at the following link: https://www.facebook.com/Miami-City-Life-Simulator-100233315901100

-Our official Facebook group, which can be viewed at the following link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/354148149481925

We would love to have you on board, we are waiting for you!

A VAST 3D OPEN-WORLD

Do you like open world offline and free roam games? Do you like sandbox games where you can do everything you want? Than this is the game for you!

Miami City Life Simulator 3D is an open world, role playing, third person simulator game. The big map, inspired by cities like Miami vice city and los Angeles, is fully explorable: you can walk around the city, buy cars, race against people, fight the crime, complete contracts, activities, take on different jobs, buy houses and more. The best part is, this is an open world game with the best mobile graphics. You can even play this open world game offline!

 

FULL OF ACTIVITIES

Take full control of the city of Miami Vice City, a city full of life, activities, social life and more. Defeat the crime of enemy gangsters and take the lead of this beautiful city. Rival tribes will do nothing against you! This is an open world game with high graphics and can be played multiplayer or even offline. This is an open world game for fans of shooting, open world like 3d games and life simulator games.

 

LOTS OF CONTENT: CARS, WEAPONS AND MORE!

Car, weapons, money.. everything you need you can find it here! It’s a true life simulation game!

In Miami City Life Simulator 3D you can use different types of motor vehicle, grand theft auto missions to take over the city and outrun the police, or just obey every traffic light. Stealing auto cars, evading cops, racing through streets, and shooting down other gangs… Take control of the city, it can be all yours! Or you can be a correct citizen, take on jobs, and living a normal life. A big open world game with missions, jobs, activities that you can play online or offline for free!

 

CHOSE WHO YOU WANT TO BE, A GAME FOR BOYS AND GIRLS!

In this game you can chose who you want to be. Are you a boy who like shooting games? No problem, you can choose your favorite character, such as Jack, and take on shooting activities, cop chasing, and more to fight crime.

Are you a girl who likes dating simulation games? We got you covered! This is a game for girls too! You can choose Bella and take on jobs like food delivery, shows, events and more with social activities.

 

REALISTIC LIFE SIMULATION

This is an open world exploration game: explore every inch of Miami Vice City, a city of liberty. Discover secrets and special items. Complete action mission, contract, racing challenge, secret collectible, and fight the crime of grand theft auto like a real police officer. One of the best open world offline games. Game Features: - Unique mix of a shooter, role playing, simulation and racing game! - Open world game with high graphics - Realistic 3D graphic game - Open world adventure game offline, free roam game - Tons of missions and activities - 15+ weapons and auto vehicles - Open world driving game, lots of car to choose. - A realistic 3D living city, full of activities - Customize your character, boy or girl, using a variety of clothes and equipment - A wide range of weapons and dozens of vehicles for you to drive - Realistic life simulation and physics

Upcoming updates: -Houses and other real estate properties -New character upgrade system -New customization system -New cars -New bosses and boss -Much more

 

!EARLY ACCESS!

Be aware: the game is still under heavy development, you can experience bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate in pools and discussions for future updates

 

Hurry up and download this open world, free roam, open world game: Miami City Life Simulator 3D, for FREE!

Stay tuned, new updates are coming soon!

 

!DISCLAIMER!

! This game is not a clone of GTA V, GTA San Andreas or GTA Vice City. This game has its own unique style, gameplay, and more. Several aspects are unique to this game, with the intention of creating a unique game, as realistic as possible, where the player can have the most fun freely. It is a simulation game, but it is still a game, the actions do not have to be performed in real life.
